般桓.definition: variant of 盤桓|盘桓[pan2 huan2]

般若.definition: (Buddhism) wisdom; insight into the true nature of reality (from Sanskrit prajñā)

般若波羅密.definition: prajña paramita (Sanskrit: supreme wisdom - beginning of the Heart Sutra)

般若波羅密多心經.pinyin: bō rě bō luó mì duō xīn jīng

般配.definition: to be well matched; to suit

般雀比拉多.definition: Pontius Pilate (in the Biblical passion story)
